dct_title_s: Afghanistan & Turkmenistan : Kabul, Kandahar, Ashgabat / edited by Yasuke Ujimiya, Mark Ramsay, Tran Dinh Coung, Dung Nguyen. Edgar Mantashayan, Phuong Vu ; Lan Joyce, editor in chief.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown as gradient tints and spot heights. Shows:international and provincial boundaries, roads, railways, Slk Road (primary and secondary), lodging places, points of interest, gas stations, parking, and airports. Title from panel. At head of title: International Travel Maps. Includes indexes, lists of attractions, and 3 insets. Inset on Afghanistan: Kabul -- Kandahar. Inset on Turkmenistan: Ashgabat.
